text: Ezɨ Herot garima, fofozir gumazir aruem anadi naghɨn izeziba a gifara. Ezɨ Herot bar puv atara uan mɨdorozir gumaziba amadagha, mɨgɨrɨgɨar gavgavim me ganɨga, me amadima me ghua, Betlehem koma an boroghɨn itir nguibaba bar dar ghua otarir azenir pumuning ko an apengan itiba, me mɨsozima me ariaghire. Kar ana aruem anadi naghɨn izezir fofozir gumazibar mɨgɨrɨgɨamɨn gɨn ghua kamaghɨn ami.
